BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_INGD1_MST (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_IT_ING_STORE_ID, NUM_ITEM_ID,GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_INGD2_MST A WHERE A.NUM_IT_ING_STORE_ID=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_INGD1_MST SET NUM_ITEM_ID=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=? WHERE NUM_IT_ING_STORE_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_INGD1_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_IT_ING_STORE_ID=? and T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_INGD2_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_IT_ING_STORE_ID=? and T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_INGD1_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where NUM_IT_ING_STORE_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and GNUM_SLNO=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_ITEM_INGD2_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where NUM_IT_ING_STORE_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and GNUM_SLNO=?
UPDATE piswca_canteen_item_ingd1_mst SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_IT_ING_STORE_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
